Suspend 2–{2}{R}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {2}{R}{R} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Emanation of Ire while it’s exiled, if a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead.
